plot: A screwball comedy about a Bi-Racial girl raised in Berkeley, CA who moves to Hollywood to pursue her "calling" and struggles to cope with the eccentricities of the town and the people in it.
title: Monika's Day
plot_es: A screwball comedy about a Bi-Racial girl raised in Berkeley, CA who moves to Hollywood to pursue her "calling" and struggles to cope with the eccentricities of the town and the people in it.
plot_en: A screwball comedy about a Bi-Racial girl raised in Berkeley, CA who moves to Hollywood to pursue her "calling" and struggles to cope with the eccentricities of the town and the people in it.
